Name: Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN - Quiet Accuracy for Reliable Results
Description:
Achieve accurate and reliable readings with the **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**. This digital device boasts incredibly quiet operation, making it ideal for use anytime without disturbing anyone. With its 90-reading memory recall function, you can easily track and compare your past results. It also includes an irregular heartbeat indicator and a body movement indicator to ensure you get the most precise data.

The **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN** is operated with a single touch and provides an average of the last three readings for enhanced accuracy. It is a sturdy and durable device designed for long-lasting performance.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**:
⭐ Plug the air hose connector firmly into the main unit's socket.
⭐ Attach the cuff around your arm, ensuring the blue marker is towards the palm side and the cuff is snug but comfortable.
⭐ Place your arm on a table so the center of the cuff is at heart level.
⭐ Press the "START/STOP" button to begin the measurement.
⭐ Results will be displayed on the screen.
⭐ Press "START/STOP" to turn off the device, or it will power off automatically.
⭐ If the irregular heartbeat indicator appears frequently, consult your doctor.

🔹 Ingredients of **Citizen Blood Pressure Monitor CH453 BCN**:
⭐ Blood Pressure Monitor
⭐ Wrap Cuff (SCN-003)
⭐ Instruction Manual
⭐ Batteries and Storage Case

Name: Signal Complete 8 Charcoal Toothpaste 75ml for Whitening & Oral Health Protection
Description:
Discover the power of nature with **Signal** Complete 8 Nature Elements whitening toothpaste, delivering a cleaner and whiter smile. This innovative toothpaste, enriched with 8 nature elements, effectively boosts your oral health protection. It contains Zinc Minerals, an antibacterial of natural origins, clinically proven to fight bacteria for healthier teeth and a visibly whiter smile in just two weeks. The toothpaste formula is crafted from 96% ingredients of natural origins, infused with 100% natural charcoal for deep cleaning and noticeable whitening.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Signal**:

For optimal oral health and protection for your entire family, follow these simple steps:
⭐ In the morning: Brush with **Signal** toothpaste and toothbrush, then rinse with **Signal** mouthwash.
⭐ During the day: Refresh your breath with **Signal** mouthwash.
⭐ At night: Brush again with **Signal** toothpaste and toothbrush, then rinse with **Signal** mouthwash.
⭐ Remember to change your toothbrush every 3 months and visit your dentist regularly for the best results.

Caution & Warnings:
⭐ For children under the age of six: Use a pea-sized amount of toothpaste and brush under adult supervision.
⭐ Do not swallow.

🔹 Ingredients of **Signal**:

⭐ Aqua, Sorbitol, Hydrated Silica, Zinc Citrate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Aroma, Cellulose Gum, Charcoal Powder, Sodium Fluoride, Sodium Saccharin. Q1 Limonene.

Name: CeraVe Blemish Control Gel Facial Moisturiser for Acne & Blemishes 40 ml
Description:
CeraVe Blemish Control Gel is an acne treatment for the face with a BHA/AHA exfoliant formulated with salicylic acid, a beta-hydroxy acid (BHA), to help clear acne & prevent new breakouts and alpha hydroxy acids (AHA), a blend of lactic and glycolic acids, to help smooth and soften skin. The formula helps to minimize the appearance of pores & reduce blackheads. Also formulated with niacinamide to help soothe skin and hyaluronic acid to help maintain skin's natural moisture. CeraVe Blemish Control Gel is alcohol-free, fragrance-free, paraben-free, oil-free, and non-comedogenic skincare. Formulated without drying alcohols like denatured alcohol, commonly found in acne spot treatments, which can cause excessive dryness. CeraVe Blemish Control Gel contains 3 essential ceramides that are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-ii) to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier. CeraVe skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.

**Product Benefits:**
⭐ Developed with Dermatologists, **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel** provides a lightweight, hydrating full-face treatment to clear acne and help prevent new acne breakouts while minimizing the appearance of pores without drying the skin.
⭐ Formulated with 3 essential ceramides to help maintain the skin’s natural barrier and niacinamide to help calm skin.
⭐ Recommended for use once per day in the evening, this formula with a powerful blend of AHA and BHA is oil-free and free of drying alcohol, leaving skin looking more radiant, smooth, and noticeably clearer after 3 days.
⭐ Targets blemishes & blackheads, helping skin look noticeably clearer.
⭐ Proven to improve skin texture and reduce pores.
⭐ Maintains healthy-looking skin with daily use.
⭐ Lightweight, fast-absorbing formula.
⭐ Hydrates skin for up to 24 hours.
⭐ Non-greasy & non-drying formula.
⭐ The number of blackheads appears reduced by up to 45%.
⭐ The number of spots appears reduced by up to 29%.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel**
⭐ Cleanse skin thoroughly before applying this product.
⭐ Start with one application daily and increase as needed or as directed by a physician.
⭐ Please wear sunscreen during the day when using this product.

🔹 Ingredients of **CeraVe Blemish Control Gel**
⭐ ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: SALICYLIC ACID 2%
⭐ INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER, SODIUM LAUROYL SARCOSINATE, COCAMIDOPROPYL HYDROXYSULTAINE, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, GLUCONOLACTONE, SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE, PEG-150 PENTAERYTHRITYL TRISTEARATE, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, CARBOMER, CALCIUM GLUCONATE, TRIETHYL CITRATE, SODIUM BENZOATE, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, CHOLESTEROL, TETRASODIUM EDTA, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, HYDROLYZED HYALURONIC ACID, TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE SUCCINATE, XANTHAN GUM, HECTORITE, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, BENZOIC ACID

Name: Cerelac Baby Cereal Wheat 400 gm - Complete Nutrition for Your Baby
Description:
NESTLE **Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat 400 gm is the perfect start to your baby's feeding journey.

**Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat features a rich and nutritious blend of wheat and milk, fortified with Iron to support cognitive and brain development, plus Bifidus and immunonutrients like Vitamins (A, C, D) and Zinc to boost your baby's immunity.

Made from 100% natural grain and easily digestible, **Cerelac** Baby Cereal Wheat is the ideal choice to help your baby transition smoothly from milk to solids.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Cerelac**:

⭐ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
⭐ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
⭐ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
⭐ Add 50g (approximately 9 level tablespoons) of **Cerelac**.
⭐ Stir well until you achieve a smooth and consistent texture, and feed immediately with a clean spoon.
⭐ Do not keep any unfinished portions.

🔹 Ingredients of **Cerelac**:

⭐ Wheat Flour
⭐ Milk Skimmed Solids
⭐ Sucrose
⭐ Caramel
⭐ Palm Olein
⭐ Low Erucic Acid Rapeseed Oil
⭐ Coconut Oil
⭐ Sunflower Oil
⭐ Vanilla Flavor
⭐ Bifidus Culture
⭐ Minerals & Vitamins

Name: Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit 1000 gm - Ideal Nutrition for Your Baby
Description:
Begin your baby's journey with healthy nutrition with **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**, specially designed to support your baby's growth from 6 months onwards. This nutritious and convenient infant cereal is a perfect blend of whole wheat grains and milk powder, fortified with Iron+ to support brain and cognitive development, and immunonutrients like Vitamins (A, C, D) and Zinc to support your baby’s immune system. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit** is made from 100% natural grains and is easily digestible, helping your baby get used to new tastes and delicious flavors.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**:
⭐ Wash your hands thoroughly before preparing baby's food and ensure all utensils are clean.
⭐ Boil clean drinking water for 5 minutes and let it cool to lukewarm temperature.
⭐ Pour 150ml of lukewarm water into the baby's bowl.
⭐ Add 50g or 9 level tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**.
⭐ Stir until the cereal is smooth and feed immediately using a clean spoon.
⭐ Do not keep unfinished portions.

🔹 Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Fruit**:
⭐ Wheat flour, dried skimmed milk, sucrose, palm olein, banana flake, pineapple juice concentrate, orange juice concentrate, low erucic acid rapeseed oil, coconut oil, sunflower oil, vanilla flavor, bifidus culture, minerals & vitamins.
⭐ Contains gluten and milk.

Name: Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g +6 Months - Optimal Nutrition for Healthy Growth
Description:
Introducing **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**, a nutritious and easily digestible cereal designed for your little ones from 6 months onwards. This wholesome cereal is carefully formulated to be free from added sugar, featuring a rich blend of multigrains including rice, wheat, oats, and corn. This unique formula is fortified with essential iron, vitamins, and minerals to support your baby's healthy growth, boost their immunity, and promote better digestion. **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g** is the perfect choice for safely and deliciously introducing your baby to solid foods.

⭐ Free from added sugars and artificial sweeteners for a healthier option.
⭐ A diverse blend of grains (rice, wheat, oats, corn) for balanced carbohydrates and fiber.
⭐ Fortified with Iron, Vitamins A, D, C, B complex, and minerals to support growth and immune system development.
⭐ Easy to digest and gentle on sensitive baby tummies.
⭐ Promotes healthy digestion with its high fiber content.
⭐ Quick and convenient to prepare with water or milk, saving feeding time.
⭐ Free from artificial colors, flavors, and preservatives.
⭐ Suitable for babies 6 months and older, perfect for starting solids.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**
⭐ Boil fresh water and let it cool to a lukewarm temperature (around 40-45°C).
⭐ Pour 2-3 heaping tablespoons of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g** per 100 ml of water or milk, or as per package instructions.
⭐ Stir well to ensure a smooth, lump-free consistency.
⭐ Allow it to cool to a comfortable temperature before feeding.
⭐ Serve immediately or store any leftovers in a covered container in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.
⭐ Always check the temperature before feeding.

🔹 Ingredients of **Cerelac Baby Cereal Multigrain Sugar Free 400g**
⭐ Rice Flour
⭐ Wheat Flour
⭐ Corn Flour
⭐ Oat Flour
⭐ Vegetable Oils (such as palm oil or sunflower oil)
⭐ Iron (fortified with iron)
⭐ Vitamins (A, D, C, B1, B2, B6, B12, Folate)
⭐ Minerals (Zinc, Calcium, Iodine)
⭐ Natural Flavors (if used)
⭐ Free from added sugars and artificial sweeteners.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **First Step Pregnancy Test Long Design**

⭐ Add 4 drops of urine sample onto the designated strip.

⭐ Ensure you observe pregnancy symptoms like a missed period, breast tenderness, and nausea.
⭐ If your period is two weeks late after intercourse, it's advisable to take the test for more accurate results.
⭐ Check the expiration date before use to ensure accurate results.

Name: First Step Medical Dressing 9x10 cm - 5 pcs
Description:
The **First Step Med Dressing** is your ideal solution for wound care and healing. This self-adhesive non-woven dressing pad is crafted from high-quality fabric with medical-grade acrylic adhesive and a fabric pad for superior absorbency. It creates an optimal occlusive environment for wounds, offering absorbency and permeability, making it highly effective for post-operative wounds, bedsores, cysts, pressure ulcers, burns, and other minor traumas. Its easy-to-apply, sturdy design ensures good hold on the skin with enhanced absorbency. Each pack contains 5 pieces, ensuring you're always prepared.

Product Features:
⭐ Easy to apply and self-adhesive.
⭐ A must-have for any first-aid kit.
⭐ Sturdy non-woven dressing with high absorbency.
⭐ Excellent adhesion and skin hold.
⭐ Each pack includes 5 pieces.
⭐ Enhances the protective barrier of wounds.
⭐ Absorbs exudate and protects the injured area.
⭐ Aids in preventing bacterial contamination.
⭐ Easily removable and breathable.
⭐ Suitable for sores, burns, cysts, and more.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **First Step Med Dressing**:
⭐ Clean the wound or area with rubbing alcohol or antibacterial fluid.
⭐ Ensure there is no active bleeding.
⭐ Peel off the backing sticker from the dressing.
⭐ Position the dressing so the center aligns with the wound and adheres.
⭐ Gently seal the sides, avoiding pressure on the wound.
⭐ To remove, wet the sides with water until it loosens, then pull off slowly.

Name: First Step Med Dressing for Wound Care - 5 pcs
Description:
Provide superior care for your wounds with **First Step Med Dressing**. These self-adhesive non-woven dressings, crafted from a high-quality fabric with medical-grade acrylic adhesive, offer excellent absorbency and wicking capabilities thanks to their compressed fibers that mimic a weave. Their comfortable design makes them supremely convenient to apply on wounds, creating an ideal occlusive environment for healing. They are particularly effective for post-operative wounds, bedsores, cysts, pressure ulcers, burns, and other minor traumas. **First Step Med Dressing** is low-adherent, allowing wounds to drain freely into an absorbent secondary dressing. They also enhance the protective barrier of wounds, absorb small leakages, protect the affected area, and help prevent bacterial contamination. Easily removable and breathable, they are a must-have for your first-aid kit.

⭐ Easy to apply with self-adhesion.
⭐ A must-have in your first-aid box.

⭐ Helps in preventing bacterial contamination.
⭐ Easily removable and breathable.
⭐ Suitable for sores, burns, or cysts.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **First Step Med Dressing**:
⭐ Clean the wound with rubbing alcohol or antibacterial fluid.
⭐ Ensure there is no bleeding.

Name: Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil - Black
Description:
Tired of shaky hands and complicated liquid eyeliner application? The **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil** helps you define your eyes with subtle precision, thanks to its user-friendly pencil form. Enriched with Vitamins E and C, and Jojoba Oil, this unique formula locks in moisture and nourishes your skin from within. It also helps prevent early signs of aging and is suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily. Its polymer-based, waterproof formula ensures long-lasting wear without smudging or fading.

⭐ Easy to Use: Offers effortless application for thin, thick, or bold lines.
⭐ Perfect Control: Allows close application to waterlines and lash lines for precise drawing.
⭐ High-Impact Color: Adds depth and an eye-catching effect to your eyes, perfect for everyday and dramatic looks.
⭐ Smudge-Proof & Fade-Proof: Long-lasting, waterproof, and tear-proof to keep your look flawless.

🔹 Usage Instructions for **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil**:
⭐ Sharpen the eyeliner pencil for a more defined line and to remove any surface bacteria.
⭐ Gently draw a thin line along the upper lash line from the inner to the outer corner of the eye.
⭐ Repeat on the lower eyelid and connect the lines at the outer corner for a natural look.
⭐ For a dramatic look, draw a line at a 45-degree angle from the outer corner of your eye and extend upwards.
⭐ Ensure the lines on both eyes are symmetrical.
⭐ Finish with eyeshadow and mascara for a perfect result.

🔹 Ingredients of **Flormar Ultra Eyeliner Pencil**:
⭐ Enriched with Vitamin E.
⭐ Contains Vitamin C.
⭐ Infused with Jojoba Oil.
⭐ Polymer-based formula for long-lasting hold.

#Flormar #Eyeliner #EyeMakeup #MakeupSaudi #Beauty #AttractiveEyes #DailyMakeup #BeautyProducts #Skincare #KSA

Give your nails a glamorous makeover with **Flormar Nail Enamel**. Nail Polish shades can be a reflection of your emotions, the occasion, or a statement about your personality overall. 🔹 Usage Instructions for **Flormar Nail Enamel**
⭐ Shake the bottle well before using.
